Package emissary.util.xml

Class JDOMUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • emissary.util.xml.AbstractJDOMUtil
      • emissary.util.xml.JDOMUtil
  • public class JDOMUtil
extends AbstractJDOMUtil
    Utilities for dealing with JDOM documents. If DTD validation is not needed, consider using SaferJDOMUtil.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class emissary.util.xml.AbstractJDOMUtil

        ERR_MSG

                                         throws org.jdom2.JDOMException
        creates a JDOM document from the input XML string.
        Parameters:
        xml - an XML document in a String
        validate - if true, XML should be validated
        Returns:
        the JDOM representation of that XML document
